SEARCH
Package org.lwjgl.nuklear

Class NkDrawVertexLayoutElement

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
org.lwjgl.system.Struct
org.lwjgl.nuklear.NkDrawVertexLayoutElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
public class NkDrawVertexLayoutElement extends Struct implements NativeResource

Layout


 struct nk_draw_vertex_layout_element {
     enum nk_draw_vertex_layout_attribute attribute();
     enum nk_draw_vertex_layout_format format();
     nk_size offset();
 }

  • Constructor Details

    • NkDrawVertexLayoutElement

      public NkDrawVertexLayoutElement(ByteBuffer container)
      Creates a NkDrawVertexLayoutElement instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

      The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
